ygData.subject: Re: Where is the Lesser Shielding spell?
ygData.msgSnippet: It s the merchant standing right outside the tower.. From: James Lecouffe  Ya you have to goto the wizards guild to get it. Just like you
ygData.messageBody:
It's the merchant standing right outside the tower..



From: "James Lecouffe" <puma@...>

Ya you have to goto the wizards guild to get it. Just like you get gate from
clarics at level 4



>I've searched through the whole mage/wiz guild to no avail. Please tell
me
if anyone
>has been successful in locating lesser shielding there and from which
specific
>merchant.
>
>"Murphy, Kenneth E." wrote:
>
>> From: "Murphy, Kenneth E." <MurphyK@...>
>>
>> > From: "Renaissance Man" <cossettb@...>
>> >
>> >

>> > Shielding spell for
